ygData.subject: Re: Hello Everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: i would but 5 of my best friends in RL are on the bristlebane server so i could not abandon it but i would make a dummie character to help make the guild if it
ygData.messageBody:
i would but 5 of my best friends in RL are on the bristlebane server so
i could not abandon it but i would make a dummie character to help make
the guild if it is needed

Sirenia wrote:
>
> From: "Sirenia" <paladin@...>
>
> Hello friends.
>
> In case any of you missed it, my character is Sirenia on the Rathe server and I am a gay male in RL. Anyway, I think the guild would be a great idea. It seems like we have a few people on the Rodcet Nife server, but many of us are spread all over different servers.
>
> Perhaps we should consider David's idea of setting up this "GLBT" guild on the new roleplaying server, Brell Serilis. We could all start from scratch and learn about each other in a group of the same level. Sirenia is a Level 24 High Elven Cleric, but I would be willing to give it all up to start again with all of you if you are interested. Then I am certain we would have enough members to form a guild there. What does everyone think of this?
>
> Sirenia Featherly, Priestess of Tunare
> Lake Rathetear, Antonica
> The Rathe Server
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
> To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
> Date: July 21, 1999 5:30 AM
> Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Hello Everyone
>
>
> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
>
> In RL my name is David. On EQ I am on the Veeshan server and mostly play a
> lvl 12 Cleric named Layf. Also occasionally play a lvl 6 Paladin name
> Rhoki, and have started a High Elf magician named Eloy. I am also thinking
> about creating a wood elf (because I think those guys are just sooo cute.
> :)
>
> My Cleric and Paladin are human and hang out around the Freeport area. I
> would like to start a GLBT guild on Veeshan if I can get enough people.
>
> I am interested in hearing from any GLBT people on Veeshan so send me a
> message or give me tell.
>
> If you'd like to learn more about me in RL, visit my home page:
>
> http://www.geocities.com/westhollywood/6270
>
> Also, is anyone on the list going to create characters on the new role
> playing server that just came online last night?
>
> Hugs,
> David
>
> [Attachments have been removed from this message]
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.
